## FILES CREATED
### Layout XML Files - `activity_cutscene.xml` - Cutscene with ViewPager2 - `item_cutscene.xml` - Cutscene scene item - `activity_galaxy_map.xml` - Galaxy selection - `item_galaxy.xml` - Galaxy card - `activity_planet_map.xml` - Planet learning path - `item_planet_node.xml` - Node item - `activity_battle.xml` - Word battle game - `activity_reward.xml` - Reward celebration - `activity_daily_missions.xml` - Daily missions - `item_mission.xml` - Mission item - `activity_word_review.xml` - Flashcard review
### Drawable XML Files - `button_primary_background.xml` - Teal gradient - `button_gold_background.xml` - Gold gradient - `button_skip_background.xml` - Transparent with border - `circle_background.xml` - Dark circle - `circle_green.xml` - Green circle - `button_answer_background.xml` - Quiz button normal - `button_answer_correct.xml` - Quiz button correct - `button_answer_wrong.xml` - Quiz button wrong - `ic_back.xml` - Back arrow vector
### Java Activity Files - `CutsceneActivity.java` - Cutscene with ViewPager2 - `CutsceneAdapter.java` - Cutscene RecyclerView adapter - `GalaxyMapActivity.java` - Galaxy selection screen - `GalaxyAdapter.java` - Galaxy list adapter - `PlanetMapActivity.java` - Planet learning path - `PlanetNodeAdapter.java` - Node list adapter - `BattleActivity.java` - Word battle game - `RewardActivity.java` - Reward celebration - `DailyMissionsActivity.java` - Daily missions - `MissionAdapter.java` - Mission list adapter - `WordReviewActivity.java` - Flashcard review
### Database Methods Added - `getLearnedWords()` - Get words marked as learned - `addCrystals(int)` - Add crystals to user - `addExperience(int)` - Add XP and level up
